transcript_chunks.text: the wingsuit it's a complete Game Changer let's go you can get the balance down of what you're doing and it just feels good to have this one extra way to keep going and keep the momentum you have there's wind tunnels everywhere you just see these like Circles of wind and if you go there it's essentially fast travel it's just Rockets you and you have to kind of adjust to get in but then you can kind of just like let go and it just it just zooms you similar to Spider-Man one when you first play it you get the control on your hands it is a little overwhelmed after like 20 minutes it's second nature and you're back and you're like I know exactly what I'm doing here the wingsuit feels weird does not feel how you'd expect it to but then the moment you understand it it adds so much more Mobility where the swings are like these big arcing movements the wingsuit is Nimble as hell and it's like you use them in conjunction with each other to like swing do a fast turn down an alley and you can

where the swings are like these big arcing movements the wingsuit is Nimble as hell and it's like you use them in conjunction with each other to like swing do a fast turn down an alley and you can wing suit down and get caught into one of the drafts and it'll shoot you up like it's just freaking cool as hell man
